title: Does Riven really need a nerf to her ult
body:
As a {{champion:92}}  main, this may seem biased, but I can assure you guys that it isn't.
Riven as a champion is already at a decent point. Putting nerfs on her will reduce her viability in lanes. She doesn't need to be nerfed at all imo. Her ult is already dodged with spells/dashes{{champion:67}} <-- I HATE THIS BTCH, so reducing the speed by such a percent is just not right. She can be beaten by a heap of top laners unless she plays right, and nerfing her without balancing out other top laners is crazy. If {{item:3071}} is the reason of the Riven nerf, I can tell you that it is not a needed item on her. The bonus health and increased CDR aren't useful. PLZ RIOT I BEG YOU. LEAVE RIVEN ALONEEEEE

riven is fine as it is

the only thing that needs to be changed is cinderhulk
when you one shot champs at 40 minutes I'd just assume that would be considered op? would it not?
At 40 minutes anyone should be able to one shot anyone.......you should have full build by then.

You're right, I haven't played Riven once in a real match. But every champion that uses no resources like Rengar and Mundo besides Yasuo, benefits heavily from any CDR. All of Riven's abilities benefit from CDR allowing her to do what she does faster and more often.

>Mundo
no resources

*facepalm*
You get what I mean right?
he does, he just wanted to be nit picky
Wow that was such a big error worthy of a face palm.
well... to be fair you can just cc them in place at melee range then use your ult. Or if you miss you could wait like 15 seconds for the ult to come back off colldown again.

So i saw this and then actually looked at the nerf they made, and this just makes me laugh at Riven mains, no more of those bullshit ult snipes, now you actually have to play well (at least as well as a riven can).

riven build{{item:3134}} =10cdr，rune 10 cd at 18，{{item:3158}} 15cdr，masteries 5cdr=40cdr，{{item:3071}} need 3000gold，3000 can build {{item:3134}} +{{item:1037}} +{{item:3279}} ，this is more useful than a {{item:3071}}，riven in not a tank，she is an assassin，{{item:3035}}  is better for riven

>The bonus health and increased CDR aren't useful.

LOOOOL

Riven is fine the way she is. Nothing else should be done to her. A champ that is not 'as good' in the current meta gives more reason to be left alone. Why out of all champs does Riot choose to nerf Riven. I agree solely with this post that Riven shouldn't be nerfed.  There's other champs like Cho'gath that should be nerfed. He is the prime example of OP atm. Insane burst if building full ap, and his ult stacks make him nearly unkillable if he has roa and some other tank items. And what about boxbox and brna, what happens to them... Any nerfs on their main champ will make them fair less against stronger champs. Renekton being one of the worst champs in this case, he can just e out of Riven's ult. Not only will it be easier to dodge, it will also give time for champs such as rene and nasus to use their ults to survive the brink of death. This may seem like a little nerf, but I can just say now, it's gonna be a snowball of hate.... #SAVE{{champion:92}}
Riven isn't op in anyway, but she needs less love seriously. It's so annoying to play against a riven. Like fiora, and satan her playstyle is so toxic. It will make League a better place.
if you are using your cc to lock your target in place when you use your ult you won't miss

That bitch needs to be removed from the game. 4 movement spells, 5 aoe damage spells,  2 aoe hard cc's, huge damage, shield that scales with ad, NO SECONDARY RESOURCE, an execute aoe ult which also increases the range of her auto attacks, her other spells, and gives her increased damage. Almost no cooldown on her sheild or other abilities, and worst of all, every riven player is toxic and thinks they are the greatest player that ever lived. Please riot, do the game a favor and remove riven and all riven players.

If Riot can't come up with any champions or items to nerf, just dont release patch notes until needed. The nerf to Riven seems to only be kicking her further away from the meta. The nerf to the movespeed is so low (5 msp), so why not just leave it as it is. The ult nerf is just soo bs, people are going to be able to sidestep it at this rate. Why not just reduce it from 2200 to 2000. 1600 is just too much of a drop in speed.
Here's a brighter idea, just leave Riven untouched... the way it's been for the past season.
